A4.text: Bob Cratchit is a fictional character in the Charles Dickens 1843 novel A Christmas Carol.

A5.text: The character of Bob Cratchit has been featured in works based on A Christmas Carol.

A6.text: The character of Bob Cratchit (A Christmas Carol);

A7.text: Pip, Miss Havisham, Estella and Abel Magwitch (Great Expectations);

A8.text: A Christmas Carol is an 1843 novella by Charles Dickens.

A9.text: A Christmas Carol (1908 film), a silent film starring Thomas Ricketts.

A10.text: Bob Cratchit was a clerk in the novella.

A11.text: Scrooge regretted mistreating his clerk, Bob Cratchit.
